metadata.title: Cookie Policy | MonPlanCBD
metadata.description: Understand how MonPlanCBD uses cookies and similar technologies on our website. Learn about necessary, functional, and analytics data.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.para1: Cookies are small text files placed on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.
section1.para2: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies (like localStorage) on MonPlanCBD. For information on how we handle your personal data in general, please see our Privacy Policy.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies
section2.para1: We use cookies and localStorage for several reasons, primarily to ensure our website functions correctly, to remember your preferences, and to help us understand how you use our site so we can improve it.

section3.title: 3. Types of Cookies and Data We Use

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies & Storage
necessary.para1: These are essential for the operation of our website and cannot be disabled in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as logging in or managing your session.
necessary.para2: You can set your browser to block or alert you about these, but some parts of the site will not then work.

cookie2.name: refreshToken
cookie2.purpose: Securely refreshes your access token for continued login.

functional.title: Functional Cookies & Storage
functional.para1: These enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages. They are only used if you consent.
functional.para2: If you do not allow these, then some or all of these services may not function properly.

storage1.name: age_verified (localStorage)
storage1.purpose: Remembers that you have confirmed you are over 18.

analytics.title: Analytics & Improvement Data
analytics.para1: With your consent, we collect certain information to help us understand how visitors interact with our website. This data helps us improve site performance and user experience.
analytics.para2: This data is collected anonymously where possible and is not used to identify you personally for marketing purposes.
analytics.para3: This information is collected only if you consent to 'Analytics & Improvement'.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.para1: Some features on our site may use cookies set by other companies (third-party cookies). For example, if we embed content from another site.
section4.para2: We list major third-party cookies below. Please review their respective privacy policies for more information.

service1.purpose: Used by Google Analytics to distinguish users and track website usage.

section5.title: 5. Managing Your Preferences
section5.para1: You have control over the non-essential cookies and data collection used on our site.
section5.para2: You can change your consent preferences at any time by clicking the '{preferencesLink}' link, usually found in the footer of our website. This will allow you to adjust the toggles for Functional and Analytics consent and save your choices.
section5.para3: Additionally, most web browsers allow some control of most cookies through the browser settings. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set, visit www.aboutcookies.org or www.allaboutcookies.org. Find out how to manage cookies on popular browsers:
section5.para4: Please note that blocking strictly necessary cookies may impact the functionality of the website.

section6.title: 6. Local Storage Usage
section6.para1: In addition to cookies, we utilize your browser's localStorage mechanism. Unlike cookies, data in localStorage is not automatically sent to the server with every request. We use it for:

item1.name: Cart Data (`cart`)
item1.purpose: To temporarily store the items you add to your shopping cart during your current browsing session.

item2.name: Order Data (`order`)
item2.purpose: To hold details of your order as you proceed through checkout, before final submission.

item3.name: User Data (`userData`)
item3.purpose: To cache some of your account information locally for quicker access after you log in.

item4.name: Age Verification (`age_verified`)
item4.purpose: To remember that you have confirmed you meet the minimum age requirement, avoiding repeated checks.

section6.para2: You can clear localStorage through your browser settings, but this may result in losing your current cart contents or requiring you to log in or verify your age again.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
section7.para1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.para1: If you have questions about our use of cookies or this policy, please contact us at {emailLink} or consult our full {privacyPolicyLink}.

fleurs-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Flowers
fleurs-cbd.faq1Answer: CBD flowers can be consumed in several ways: in infusion (with a fatty substance), through vaporization (recommended method to preserve aromas and avoid combustion), or in cooking. Selling CBD flowers for smoking is prohibited in France.
fleurs-cbd.faq2Question: What are the effects of CBD flowers?
fleurs-cbd.faq2Answer: Effects vary depending on the strain and the individual but are generally associated with relaxation, muscle relief, mood improvement, and potential relief from stress and anxiety, without psychotropic effects.
fleurs-cbd.faq3Question: Which CBD flower should I choose?

pollens-resines-hash-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Resins & Pollens: Concentration and Intense Aromas
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionPara1: Explore the richness and potency of our CBD resins and pollens, concentrated products derived from the resinous trichomes of the hemp plant. Perfect for those seeking a more intense CBD experience or pronounced flavors, our selection includes various textures: from crumbly pollen üçÇ to more compact and malleable resins ‚ú®, including modern extractions.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionPara2: Each CBD hash or pollen is carefully crafted to maximize cannabinoid concentration and preserve a rich terpene profile, ensuring deep aromas and potentially more pronounced effects. Ideal for vaporization or infusion (always with a fatty substance), it's an excellent alternative to diversify your CBD consumption. Naturally, all our products comply with the legal limit of 0.3% THC.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Advantages of Our CBD Resins and Pollens
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem1: ‚ú® High Concentration: High content of CBD and other cannabinoids for potentially enhanced effects.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem2: üëÉ Intense Aromatic Profile: Rich in terpenes for powerful and complex flavors.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem3: üëê Varied Textures: From light pollen to dense resins, choose based on your handling preferences.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem4: üî¨ Quality Controlled: Extracted from selected hemp plants and analyzed by independent laboratories.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem5: ‚öñÔ∏è Legal Compliance: THC level always below 0.3% for worry-free consumption.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Resins and Pollens
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq1Question: What's the difference between CBD pollen and resin?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq1Answer: Pollen (or skuff) is generally drier and more crumbly, collected by sifting trichomes. Resin (or hash) is often pressed (hot or cold) from pollen or trichomes, resulting in a more compact, sticky, or oily texture.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq2Question: How to use CBD resins and pollens?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq2Answer: Temperature-controlled vaporization is the most recommended method to fully appreciate the aromas and effects. Infusion in a fatty substance (milk, oil) is also possible. Some also add them to cooking.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq3Question: Are CBD resins stronger than flowers?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq3Answer: Generally yes, as they are concentrates of cannabinoids and terpenes. The CBD level is often higher than in flowers, which can lead to effects perceived as more intense. Always start with a small amount.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.moreInfoText: Curious to learn more about extraction methods and the specifics of CBD concentrates?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Explore concentrated CBD resins & pollens. Potency, intense flavors & varied textures. Lab-guaranteed quality <0.3% THC | MonPlanCBD.

The result? A product of exceptional potency and extraordinary aromatic complexity.
moonrocks-cbd.descriptionPara2: CBD Moonrocks are aimed at experienced consumers seeking the most pronounced effects of CBD. Due to their dense and rich composition, they are ideal for moments of deep relaxation. We recommend gently crumbling them by hand (avoid grinders) and using them in vaporization or as a supplement in your infusions. moonrocks-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Moonrocks
moonrocks-cbd.faq1Question: What exactly is a CBD Moonrock?
moonrocks-cbd.faq1Answer: It's a "triple-layer" CBD product: a high-quality CBD flower is dipped or coated in a concentrated CBD extract (oil, distillate) and then completely covered in CBD pollen (kief).
moonrocks-cbd.faq2Question: How to consume a CBD Moonrock?
moonrocks-cbd.faq2Answer: Avoid grinding it as the oil will make it sticky. Gently crumble it by hand or with scissors. Vaporization is the ideal method to appreciate the flavors. You can also add small pieces to your infusions (with a fatty substance) or other preparations.
moonrocks-cbd.faq3Answer: Yes, due to their very high CBD concentration combining flower, oil, and pollen, the perceived effects can be significantly more intense than those of classic flowers or resins. It is advisable to start with a very small amount.
moonrocks-cbd.moreInfoText: Intrigued by these CBD nuggets? Discover more details about their creation and use.

Designed for optimal sublingual absorption (under the tongue), our oils offer a practical and discreet method to enjoy cannabidiol. Each bottle comes with a dropper pipette for precise and personalized dosing.
huiles-cbd.descriptionPara2: We offer Full Spectrum CBD oils, containing all the cannabinoids (CBD, CBG, CBN...), terpenes, and flavonoids naturally present in hemp (THC < 0.3%), promoting the entourage effect. For those who prefer to avoid any trace of THC, our Broad Spectrum oils are ideal. Available in various concentrations (from 5% to 40% and more), you can choose the CBD oil best suited to your needs and sensitivity.
huiles-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Advantages of Our CBD Oils
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem1: ‚úÖ Ease of Use: Precise dosing thanks to the dropper pipette.
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem2: ‚ö° Rapid Absorption: The sublingual route allows for efficient cannabinoid absorption.

huiles-cbd.benefitsItem5: üî¨ Quality and Purity: Oils derived from supercritical CO2 or ethanol extractions, lab-tested.
huiles-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Oils
huiles-cbd.faq1Answer: Place the desired number of drops under your tongue using the pipette. Hold for 60 to 90 seconds before swallowing. This allows for direct absorption through the sublingual mucous membranes.
huiles-cbd.faq2Question: Which CBD oil concentration should I choose?
huiles-cbd.faq2Answer: It depends on your experience with CBD, your weight, and the desired effect. It is often advisable to start with a low concentration (5% or 10%) and gradually adjust the dose (number of drops) or concentration if necessary.
huiles-cbd.faq3Question: Full Spectrum or Broad Spectrum oil: what's the difference?
huiles-cbd.faq3Answer: Full Spectrum oil contains all hemp compounds, including traces of THC (<0.3%), which promotes the entourage effect (component synergy). Broad Spectrum oil also contains many cannabinoids and terpenes, but the THC has been removed.
huiles-cbd.moreInfoText: Need help choosing your oil or understanding dosages?
huiles-cbd.blogLinkText: Check out our complete CBD guides

A gentle and natural way to invite relaxation into your daily life.
infusions-cbd.descriptionPara2: Our CBD teas are prepared from quality hemp and natural ingredients. For optimal effectiveness, we recommend adding a fatty substance (like a touch of whole milk, coconut oil, or butter) to your hot infusion, as CBD is fat-soluble. Discover our blends designed for relaxation üí§, digestion, or simply for the pleasure of a comforting hot drink, always with less than 0.3% THC.
infusions-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Perks of Our CBD Infusions
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem1: üòå Gentle Approach: A gradual and non-intimidating way to consume CBD.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem2: ‚òï Wellness Ritual: Turn your tea or herbal tea break into an enriched relaxation moment.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem3: üåø Natural Synergy: Combination of CBD with other plants known for their beneficial properties.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem4: üòã Pleasant Flavors: Aromatic blends for an enjoyable tasting experience.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem5: üíß Hydration & CBD: Combine the benefits of hydration and cannabidiol.
infusions-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Infusions
infusions-cbd.faq1Question: Do I really need to add fat to my CBD infusion?
infusions-cbd.faq1Answer: Yes, it is highly recommended. CBD is not water-soluble but fat-soluble (liposoluble). Adding a fatty substance like milk, cream, coconut oil, or butter allows for better extraction and absorption of CBD by your body.
infusions-cbd.faq2Question: What are the effects of CBD tea?
infusions-cbd.faq2Answer: The effects are generally milder and appear more slowly than with sublingual oil, as the CBD passes through the digestive system. They are often described as promoting general relaxation, calmness, and well-being, enhanced by the other plants present.
infusions-cbd.faq3Question: When should I drink a CBD infusion?
infusions-cbd.faq3Answer: It depends on the blend and your needs. Some are ideal in the evening to promote relaxation before bed, while others can be enjoyed during the day for a relaxing break without marked drowsiness. Read the description of each infusion.
infusions-cbd.moreInfoText: Explore the different ways to prepare and enjoy your CBD beverages.

soins-cbd.descriptionPara2: Discover products like the CBD balm for targeted relief of tense areas, the moisturizing CBD cream to soothe sensitive or irritated skin, or the massage oil for optimal muscle relaxation. Our formulas are developed to penetrate quickly without leaving a greasy film, while respecting your skin and the legislation (THC < 0.3%).
soins-cbd.benefitsTitle: Discover the Benefits of Our CBD Care Products

soins-cbd.benefitsItem3: üí™ Muscle & Joint Comfort: Ideal after exercise or to relieve daily tension.
soins-cbd.benefitsItem4: üåø Natural Ingredients: Combination of CBD with vegetable oils, butters, and plant extracts.

soins-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Body Care
soins-cbd.faq1Question: How do topical CBD products work?
soins-cbd.faq1Answer: Applied to the skin, CBD interacts with cannabinoid receptors present locally in the epidermis and underlying tissues. Unlike sublingual oils, it generally does not enter the bloodstream significantly, acting in a targeted manner.
soins-cbd.faq2Question: What are CBD care products suitable for?
soins-cbd.faq2Answer: They are popular for soothing localized muscle or joint pain, calming skin irritations (dryness, redness...), moisturizing the skin, or simply for a relaxing massage.
soins-cbd.faq3Question: Do CBD creams have psychotropic effects?
soins-cbd.faq3Answer: No. CBD itself is not psychotropic. Furthermore, topical application strongly limits the passage of CBD and other components (including traces of THC <0.3%) into the bloodstream, making any systemic or psychotropic effect improbable.
soins-cbd.moreInfoText: Learn more about the interaction between CBD and the skin and discover our care rituals.
soins-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Discover our CBD care: balms, creams, massage oils. Targeted action for muscle/joint comfort & skin hydration | MonPlanCBD.

vaporisateur.sectionTitle: Vaporizers: The Modern and Healthy Method for CBD
vaporisateur.descriptionPara1: Optimize your CBD experience with our selection of high-performance vaporizers üí®. Vaporization is a modern consumption method that heats your CBD flowers üåø or resins ‚ú® to a precise temperature, without reaching combustion. This releases cannabinoids and terpenes as pure vapor, preserving delicate aromas and avoiding harmful byproducts associated with smoke.
vaporisateur.descriptionPara2: Whether you're looking for a portable vaporizer for discreet use on the go or a desktop model for longer sessions, we have the device for you. Choosing a CBD vaporizer means opting for better flavor rendition, more economical use of your products, and an approach considered healthier than traditional methods involving combustion.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem1: ‚úÖ Combustion-Free: Avoids inhaling tars and toxins associated with smoke.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem2: üëÉ Preserved Flavors: Faithful and pure rendition of the aromas and terpenes of your CBD products.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem3: ‚ö° Increased Efficiency: Better bioavailability of cannabinoids compared to combustion.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem4: üí∞ Economical: Optimized use of your CBD flowers and resins.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem5: üå¨Ô∏è Discreet: Less lingering odor than traditional smoke.
vaporisateur.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Vaporizers
vaporisateur.faq1Answer: A vaporizer heats plant material (flowers) or concentrates (resins) to a controlled temperature (usually between 160¬∞C and 220¬∞C / 320¬∞F and 428¬∞F). This heat releases the active compounds as vapor, which is then inhaled, without burning the material.
vaporisateur.faq2Question: What temperature should I use to vaporize CBD?
vaporisateur.faq2Answer: The ideal temperature varies depending on preferences and products. Lower temperatures (160-180¬∞C / 320-356¬∞F) favor flavors, while higher temperatures (190-210¬∞C / 374-410¬∞F) extract more cannabinoids for potentially stronger effects. Experiment to find your optimal setting.
vaporisateur.faq3Answer: Vaporization is widely considered a healthier alternative to combustion (smoking). By avoiding burning the material, it eliminates the creation and inhalation of many toxic and carcinogenic substances found in smoke.
vaporisateur.moreInfoText: Ready to switch to vaporization? Discover our tips for choosing and maintaining your device.
vaporisateur.descriptionMetaTag: Optimize your CBD experience with our vaporizers. Healthy, combustion-free method for flowers & resins. Pure flavors guaranteed | MonPlanCBD.

cbdSection.title: What is CBD?
cbdSection.text: Cannabidiol (CBD) is a molecule found in hemp. CBD complements the spectrum of 110 other cannabinoids known to date. It is known for its wellness benefits for sleep, stress, anxiety, muscle tension, etc. It is available in the form of CBD balm, oil, or CBD flowers for infusion.

cbdPassion.imgAlt: CBD flowers with full spectrum oils and hemp seeds
cbdPassion.title: A Passion for CBD...
cbdPassion.text: My CBD Plan, it‚Äôs an idea that sprouted one winter afternoon at the Bistrot des Halles in Bayonne. Each of us has individually cultivated an interest in this plant, hemp. Whether for personal use, for our loved ones, or our community, we agree, like many others, that a promising future is shaping up around this plant, which has been used ancestrally around the world.

section6.title: 6. Product Information and Important Warnings (CBD)
section6.intro: The Products offered on the Site contain Cannabidiol (CBD), a non-psychotropic cannabinoid derived from the hemp plant (*Cannabis Sativa L.*). It is essential that Users understand the nature of these Products and adhere to the following precautions for use:

subsection_compliance.title: Product Nature and Legal Compliance (THC < 0.3%)
subsection_compliance.para1: Our Products are carefully selected and comply with current French and European legislation. They contain a tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) level strictly below 0.3%, in accordance with regulations. These Products are not narcotics and do not cause psychotropic effects.
subsection_compliance.para2: We provide laboratory analysis certificates to attest to this compliance. It is the User's responsibility to ensure the legality of possessing and consuming CBD products in their country or region of residence if it differs from France.

subsection_no_medical_claims.title: Absence of Therapeutic Claims
subsection_no_medical_claims.para1: Products sold on this Site are not medicines and cannot under any circumstances be considered as such. They are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, mitigate, or prevent any disease. Information provided on the Site (blog, product descriptions, etc.) is for informational purposes only, based on public research and user feedback. It does not replace the advice of a qualified healthcare professional. MonPlanCBD makes no therapeutic claims regarding its Products.

subsection_usage_recommendations.title: Usage Recommendations (Infusion/Vaporization)
subsection_usage_recommendations.intro: For an optimal experience consistent with the nature of the Products:

item_flowers.label: Flowers and Resins/Pollens:
item_flowers.text: We recommend use via infusion (adding a fatty substance like whole milk, coconut oil, or butter for better cannabinoid assimilation) or via vaporization at a controlled temperature (typically between 160¬∞C and 220¬∞C) using a suitable vaporizer. Vaporization helps preserve the aromas (terpenes) and avoids harmful byproducts associated with combustion.

item_oils.label: CBD Oils:
item_oils.text: Our oils are designed for sublingual administration. Place the desired number of drops under the tongue, hold for 60 to 90 seconds before swallowing.

subsection_usage_recommendations.outro: Please follow any specific instructions provided on the Product packaging.

subsection_no_smoking.title: Prohibition of Smoking
subsection_no_smoking.para1: Our CBD flowers, resins, and pollens are absolutely not intended to be smoked. The combustion of plant matter, regardless of its type, generates toxic and harmful substances for health. MonPlanCBD disclaims all liability for the use of its Products via combustion (smoking).

item_medical.label: Medical Consultation:
item_medical.text: If you are undergoing medical treatment, suffer from specific health problems, or have any doubts, it is imperative to consult your doctor or a healthcare professional before consuming products containing CBD. CBD may interact with certain medications.

item_driving.label: Driving and Drowsiness:
item_driving.text: Although CBD is not psychotropic, it may cause a feeling of relaxation or drowsiness in some individuals. Do not drive or operate heavy machinery if you feel drowsy after consuming CBD. Adjust your consumption according to your sensitivity and planned activities.

item_pregnancy.label: Pregnancy and Breastfeeding:
item_pregnancy.text: As a precautionary measure, CBD consumption is strongly discouraged for pregnant or breastfeeding women due to the lack of sufficient studies on its potential effects.

item_minors.label: Minors:
item_minors.text: The sale and consumption of our Products are strictly prohibited to minors under 18 years of age.

subsection_variability.title: Variability of Effects
subsection_variability.para1: The effects experienced after consuming CBD can vary considerably from person to person depending on factors such as weight, metabolism, individual sensitivity, the dose consumed, and frequency of use. Always start with a low dose to assess your personal reaction.

introduction.para1: This Shipping Policy outlines the terms and conditions regarding the shipment of orders placed on www.monplancbd.fr. By placing an order, you agree to this policy.

processing.para1: Orders are typically processed and dispatched within 24 business hours (Monday to Friday) of receiving payment confirmation.
processing.para2: Please note that orders placed after 3:00 PM (CET) on Friday, or on weekends/public holidays, will be processed on the next business day. See the calendar below for estimated dispatch times:

q1.question: What exactly is CBD (Cannabidiol)?
q1.answer: CBD, or Cannabidiol, is one of the many natural compounds found in the hemp plant (Cannabis Sativa L.). Unlike THC, it has no psychoactive effects. It is studied for its various potential properties related to well-being.

q2.question: What is the difference between CBD and THC?
q2.answer: CBD (Cannabidiol) and THC (Tetrahydrocannabinol) are two cannabinoids from hemp, but with very different effects. THC is the psychoactive compound responsible for the 'high' effect of recreational cannabis and is illegal above a certain threshold in France. CBD is not psychoactive and does not cause euphoria.

q3.question: Is CBD legal in France and Europe?
q3.answer: Yes, CBD is legal in France and most European countries, provided that the finished products contain a THC level below 0.3%, in accordance with current legislation.

q4.question: Do MonPlanCBD products contain THC? What is the maximum level?
q4.answer: All our products strictly comply with French and European legislation. They contain a THC level below 0.3%, as required by law. Each product comes with independent laboratory analyses that you can consult.

q5.question: Does CBD have psychoactive effects? Does it get you 'high'?
q5.answer: No, CBD does not have psychoactive effects and does not cause the feeling of euphoria or 'high' associated with THC.

q6.question: What are the potential effects or perceived benefits of CBD?
q6.answer: Users often report a feeling of relaxation, stress management improvement, or better sleep. However, CBD is not a medicine and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Effects can vary from person to person. We make no therapeutic claims.

q7.question: Is CBD addictive?
q7.answer: According to the World Health Organization (WHO), CBD does not exhibit potential for abuse or dependence. It is considered to have a good safety profile.

q8.question: What types of CBD products do you offer (flowers, oils, resins, etc.)?
q8.answer: We offer a wide range of products to suit different preferences: CBD Flowers for infusion or vaporization, sublingual CBD Oils, CBD Resins and Pollens, Moonrocks, as well as Skincare products and Vaporizers. Discover our full catalog {productsLink}.

q9.question: What is the difference between CBD flowers, oils, and resins?
q9.answer_flowers_text: These are the dried buds of the hemp plant, rich in CBD. They are generally used for infusion or vaporization.
q9.answer_oils_text: They are obtained by extracting CBD from the plant and diluting it in a carrier oil (like MCT or hemp oil). They are taken sublingually (under the tongue) for rapid absorption.
q9.answer_resins_text: These are concentrated extractions of the plant's trichomes (small resin glands), offering higher CBD levels. They are often used for vaporization.

q10.question: How do I choose the CBD product that's right for me?
q10.answer: The choice depends on your personal preferences, the desired effect, and the desired speed of action. Oils offer rapid absorption and precise dosing. Flowers and resins (via infusion/vaporization) allow you to enjoy the natural aromas of the plant. Feel free to browse our product categories and read the descriptions to help you choose.

q11.question: What does the CBD percentage indicated on your products mean?
q11.answer: The percentage indicates the concentration of CBD in the product. For example, a 10% oil contains 1000mg of CBD per 10ml of oil. For flowers or resins, it represents the weight of CBD relative to the total weight of the product (e.g., 15% = 150mg of CBD per gram).

q12.question: How do you guarantee the quality and safety of your products? (Lab tests, origin)
q12.answer: Quality is our priority. All our products come from authorized hemp varieties grown in the European Union, without pesticides or herbicides. Each batch undergoes analysis by independent laboratories to verify cannabinoid levels (CBD, THC <0.3%) and ensure the absence of contaminants. You can consult these analyses {analysisLink}.

q13.question: Where do your hemp/CBD products come from?
q13.answer: We rigorously select our products from hemp producers based mainly in Europe (France, Switzerland, Italy, etc.), known for their respectful cultivation practices and the quality of their harvests.

q14.question: How should I store my CBD products?
q14.answer: To best preserve their qualities, store your CBD products in their original packaging, away from direct sunlight, excessive heat, and moisture. A cool, dry place is ideal.

q15.question: How to use CBD flowers? (Infusion/Vaporization)
q15.answer_infusion_text: Infuse the crumbled flowers in hot (not boiling) water for 5 to 10 minutes, adding a fatty substance (whole milk, coconut oil, butter) to help extract the CBD (which is fat-soluble).
q15.answer_vaporization_text: Use a vaporizer designed for dry herbs. Heat to the recommended temperature (usually between 170¬∞C and 210¬∞C) to inhale the vapors without combustion.

q16.question: How to use CBD oil? (Sublingual)
q16.answer: Place the desired number of drops under your tongue using the provided dropper. Hold the oil under the tongue for 60 to 90 seconds before swallowing. This allows for faster absorption through the mucous membranes.

q17.question: Can CBD flowers or resins be smoked?
q17.answer_text: Our flowers and resins are not intended for smoking. Combustion degrades beneficial compounds and produces harmful substances. We exclusively recommend infusion or vaporization to fully and healthily enjoy our products.

q18.question: What CBD dosage should I take?
q18.answer: There is no universal dosage, as effects vary depending on the individual (weight, metabolism, sensitivity). We always advise starting with a low dose (e.g., a few drops of oil or a small amount in infusion/vaporization) and gradually increasing if necessary, listening to your body. If in doubt or if you are undergoing medical treatment, consult a healthcare professional.

q19.question: How do I place an order on MonPlanCBD?
q19.answer: It's simple: browse our products, add the ones you want to your cart, then click on the cart icon to finalize your order. Follow the indicated steps to enter your delivery address, choose your delivery method, and make the secure payment.

q20.question: Do I need to create an account to order?
q20.answer: No, you can place an order as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track your orders more easily, access your history, manage your addresses, and benefit from our loyalty program.

q21.question: What payment methods are accepted? Is the payment secure?
q21.answer: We accept secure payments by credit/debit card (Visa, Mastercard). All transactions are protected by SSL encryption protocol and the 3D Secure system to ensure the security of your bank details via our payment partner Stripe.

q22.question: How does your loyalty program work? How do I use my points?
q22.answer: Our loyalty program allows you to accumulate points with each purchase made on our site. You can then redeem these points for discounts on your next orders directly from your cart. For more details, visit the page dedicated to our {loyaltyProgramLink}.

q23.question: What are the shipping costs and delivery times?
q23.answer: Shipping costs vary depending on your destination country and order amount. We offer free shipping above a certain purchase amount (e.g., ‚Ç¨40 for mainland France). Delivery times are generally [Insert typical timeframe, e.g., 24 to 72 business hours] for France after dispatch, but are indicative only. You can find full details (rates, free shipping thresholds, estimated times per country) on our {shippingPolicyLink} page.

q24.question: Which countries do you ship to?
q24.answer: We currently ship to mainland France, [List other main countries like Belgium, Spain, Ireland, R√©union, etc., as per GTC]. The complete list of countries and associated costs are available on our {shippingPolicyLink} page.

q25.question: How can I track my order?
q25.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email containing a tracking number. You can use this number on the carrier's website (e.g., Chronopost) to track the progress of your package in real time.

q26.question: What should I do if my package is damaged or does not arrive?
q26.answer: If your package arrives damaged, refuse it if possible or make specific reservations on the delivery note before accepting it. Take photos and contact us immediately at contact@monplancbd.fr. If your package is marked as "delivered" but you have not received it, please also contact us so we can initiate an investigation with the carrier. Consult our {gtcLink} (Article 7) for more details.

q27.question: Are your packages discreet?
q27.answer: Yes, all our orders are shipped in neutral, discreet packaging with no external mention of MonPlanCBD or its contents, to ensure your privacy.

q28.question: What is your return policy?
q28.answer: In accordance with the law, you have 14 days from receipt of your order to exercise your right of withdrawal, without justification. Products must be returned intact, complete, unopened, and in their original sealed packaging.

q29.question: How do I return an item?
q29.answer: To return an item, please first contact us at contact@monplancbd.fr within the 14-day period to inform us of your decision. We will then provide you with the return procedure and address. Return shipping costs are your responsibility. For more details, consult our {gtcLink} (Article 6) or our {returnPolicyLink}.
q29.gtcLinkText: General Terms and Conditions of Sale

q30.question: Does CBD have side effects?
q30.answer: CBD is generally well tolerated. However, some people may experience mild side effects such as fatigue, dry mouth, or changes in appetite. These effects are often related to high dosages. Always start with a low dose.

q31.question: Can I drive after consuming CBD?
q31.answer: Although CBD is not psychoactive, it can cause drowsiness in some people. As a precaution, we advise against driving or operating heavy machinery immediately after consuming CBD, especially if you are new to it or feel tired.

q32.question: Is CBD safe for pregnant or breastfeeding women?
q32.answer: Due to a lack of sufficient studies on the effects of CBD during pregnancy and breastfeeding, we strongly advise against its use by pregnant or breastfeeding women.

q33.question: Can CBD interact with medications?
q33.answer_text: CBD can interact with certain medications by affecting how they are metabolized by the liver (via the cytochrome P450 enzyme system). If you are taking medication, it is **essential** to consult your doctor or pharmacist before consuming CBD.

q34.question: Will CBD show up on a drug test?
q34.answer: Standard drug tests primarily screen for THC. Our products contain less than 0.3% THC, complying with the law. However, consuming very large quantities of CBD products, especially full-spectrum ones, *could* theoretically result in a detectable trace of THC. If you are subject to regular testing, consider using CBD isolate products or discuss it with your employer/testing body.

introduction.title: Introduction and Commitment
introduction.para1: Welcome to www.monplancbd.fr. MONPLANCBD SAS ("MONPLANCBD", "we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of its users and customers ("you"). This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, why we collect it, how we use, share, and protect it, and the rights you have regarding your data. We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - Regulation (EU) 2016/679) and the applicable French Data Protection Act.

contract.item_delivery: Ensure the delivery of products to the specified address.
contract.item_crm: Manage the customer relationship (order tracking, after-sales service, claims).

legalObligation.item_authority_requests: Respond to requests from competent authorities.

consent.withdrawal_note: You can withdraw your consent at any time (see "Your Rights" section).

legitimateInterest.basis: Our Legitimate Interest (Legal basis: Legitimate Interest):

legitimateInterest.item_personalization: Personalize your experience on the site (e.g., display relevant products).

dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share it with trusted third parties to achieve the purposes described above:
dataSharing.item_payment: Payment providers: To process your payments securely (e.g., Stripe).
dataSharing.item_carriers: Shipping carriers: To ensure the delivery of your orders (e.g., Chronopost, La Poste).

dataSharing.item_emailing: Emailing platforms: To send our newsletters, if you have consented (Benchmark Email - Requires verification of data processing location and safeguards).

dataSharing.outro: We ensure that our partners respect the confidentiality and security of your data and use it only for the tasks entrusted to them.

transfers.title: International Transfers:
transfers.para1: Our hosting servers (Scaleway) are located within the European Union.
transfers.para2_outside_eu: Some of our service providers, such as our emailing platform Benchmark Email, may process data outside the EU (e.g., in the United States). In such cases, we ensure that these transfers are governed by appropriate safeguards, such as the Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission, to ensure an adequate level of protection for your data.
transfers.para2_inside_eu: All our main service providers process your data within the European Union.

dataRetention.title: How Long Do We Keep Your Data?
dataRetention.intro: We keep your personal data only for the time necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, in compliance with regulations:
dataRetention.item_client_active: Customer data (active account): Kept for the entire duration of the commercial relationship, then archived for 3 years from your last activity (order, account login, etc.), unless you request deletion or object.
dataRetention.item_order_billing: Order/Billing data: Kept for the mandatory legal period of 10 years from the end of the accounting year.
dataRetention.item_prospects: Prospect data (no order): Kept for 3 years from your last interaction (email click, contact, etc.), unless you request deletion or object.
dataRetention.item_marketing_consent: Marketing consent data: Kept as long as you do not withdraw your consent.
dataRetention.item_cookies: Cookies: Cookie lifespan is detailed in our Cookie Policy (generally 13 months maximum for non-essential cookies requiring consent).

dataSecurity.title: How Do We Protect Your Data?
dataSecurity.para1: We take the security of your data very seriously. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes using the SSL/TLS protocol to encrypt data exchanged on our site, secure access to our systems, and internal data management policies.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.introduction: We use cookies and similar technologies. For detailed information on the cookies we use, their purposes, and how you can manage them, please consult our dedicated

yourRights.title: Your Rights Regarding Your Personal Data
yourRights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights over your personal data:
yourRights.item_access: Right of access: Request to view the data we hold about you.
yourRights.item_rectification: Right to rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
yourRights.item_erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'): Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal retention obligations.
yourRights.item_restriction: Right to restriction of processing: Request to temporarily freeze the use of some of your data.
yourRights.item_portability: Right to data portability: Receive the data you provided us in a structured, commonly used format, and transmit it to another controller if technically feasible.
yourRights.item_objection: Right to object: Object to the processing of your data for legitimate reasons, and at any time for direct marketing (including profiling related to direct marketing).
yourRights.item_withdraw_consent: Right to withdraw consent: For processing based on consent (newsletter, certain cookies), you can withdraw it at any time.
yourRights.item_post_mortem: Right to define post-mortem directives: Organize the fate of your data after your death.

howToExercise.title: How to exercise your rights:
howToExercise.intro: You can exercise most of these rights directly from your customer area:
howToExercise.item_profile: Modify your personal information in the {profileLink} section.
howToExercise.item_addresses: Manage your addresses in the {addressesLink} section.
howToExercise.item_newsletter: Manage your newsletter subscription in the "My Profile" section or via the unsubscribe links in our emails.
howToExercise.outro: For any other request or to exercise rights not available via your account, you can contact us by email at contact@monplancbd.fr or by post to the address indicated in Article 2, enclosing a copy of an identity document if necessary to verify your identity. We commit to responding within one month.

complaintRight.title: Right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL:
complaintRight.para1: If you believe, after contacting us, that your rights are not respected, you can lodge a complaint with the French Data Protection Authority (CNIL): {cnilLink}.

minorsPolicy.title: Policy Regarding Minors
minorsPolicy.para1: Our site and products are not intended for minors under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or process personal data from minors. If we discover that we have collected such data, we will delete it immediately.

policyUpdate.title: Privacy Policy Updates
policyUpdate.para1: We may occasionally modify this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal or regulatory reasons. In case of substantial changes, we will inform you by email (if we have your address) or via a notification on our website before the change becomes effective. We encourage you to consult this page regularly.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or the management of your personal data, please contact us:
contact.postalAddress: MONPLANCBD SAS, Data Protection Officer, 2 place Elie Lambert, 64100 Bayonne, France.

about.pageTitle: Our Story: The Passion for Quality CBD at MonPlanCBD
about.imageAlt: The landscape that inspired the brand

section1.title: The Spark: Our Origin Story
section1.para1: It all began not in a high-tech lab, but in the vibrant heart of the Basque Country, during a late winter afternoon at the Bistrot des Halles in Bayonne. Around a table, a lively conversation among passionate friends revealed a growing shared interest in an ancient plant with fascinating virtues: hemp, and more specifically, Cannabidiol (CBD).
section1.para2: Each of us had discovered CBD in our own way. For some, it was a personal quest for well-being, a natural means to find serenity and balance amidst daily stress. For others, it was the desire to help loved ones, to share a gentle alternative to soothe tensions or improve sleep. Whether in the form of oil, balm, or infusion, we were all convinced of the incredible potential of this molecule derived from hemp.
section1.para3: From this shared passion, a simple yet powerful idea was born: to create MonPlanCBD. Not just another online shop, but a trusted space, rooted in our values, where everyone could find exceptional CBD products, selected with the same rigor we would use for ourselves or our families.

section2.title: Our Commitment: Quality & Transparency
section2.intro: At MonPlanCBD, our mission goes beyond simple sales. We are driven by a deep conviction: wellness through CBD can only flourish on a foundation of **trust** and **quality**. That's why we are committed to clear and non-negotiable principles:

item1.label: Rigorous Selection:
item1.text: We search across Europe (prioritizing France whenever possible) to find partner producers who share our ethics: respectful cultivation (Indoor, Greenhouse, Outdoor), artisanal know-how, and adherence to the strictest standards. Every flower, every resin, every oil is chosen for its unique aromatic profile and wellness potential.

item2.label: Total Transparency:
item2.text: Trust is earned. That's why *every batch* of our products is systematically analyzed by an independent, certified third-party laboratory. We meticulously verify the cannabinoid concentration (CBD, CBG, CBN...) and ensure that the THC level always remains strictly below the French legal limit of 0.3%. These analysis certificates are available because your peace of mind is our priority.

item3.label: French Expertise & Traceability:
item3.text: Based in the Basque Country, we are proud of our local roots and our human-scale approach. We know our partners and track our products from cultivation to your doorstep, ensuring complete traceability.

item4.label: Personalized Support:
item4.text: The world of CBD can seem complex. Our team of enthusiasts, based in France, is here to listen, advise, and answer all your questions with kindness and expertise. Never hesitate to contact us.

section3.title: More Than Products: A Vision for Wellness
section3.para1: MonPlanCBD represents the desire to democratize access to superior quality CBD, legally and transparently. We believe in a holistic approach to well-being, where nature provides us with precious keys.
section3.para2: Whether you're a newcomer curious to explore the potential benefits of CBD for relaxation, sleep, or stress management, or a connoisseur seeking specific flavors and experiences, we are here to guide you.
section3.para3: Explore our different ranges ‚Äì from flowers with captivating aromas to easy-to-dose oils, concentrated resins, and soothing care products ‚Äì and find the 'CBD plan' that suits you.

cta.intro: Join the MonPlanCBD community and discover a natural, transparent, and high-quality approach to well-being.
cta.link3: Visit our Blog to learn more
